name: The Tide Coal Company, Appellant, v. Monongahela Navigation Company
name_abbreviation: Tide Coal Co. v. Monongahela Navigation Co.

judges: Before Sterrett, C. J., Green, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean, Fell and Brown, J J.
parties: The Tide Coal Company, Appellant, v. Monongahela Navigation Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Brown,
The sole question involved in this appeal has been considered and passed upon in the case of Monongahela Navigation Company v. John A. Wood and Samuel L. Wood, doing business as John A. Wood & Son, ante, p. 47, and for the reasons therein stated, the judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Brown,

casebody.head_matter:
The Tide Coal Company, Appellant, v. Monongahela Navigation Company.
December 30, 1899:
Argued Oct. 24, 1899.
Appeal, No. 54, Oct. T., 1899, by plaintiff, from judgment of C. P. No. 3, Allegheny Co., Nov. T., 1896, No. 721, on verdict for defendant.
Before Sterrett, C. J., Green, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean, Fell and Brown, J J.
Affirmed.
